summary: This is an email from an Associate U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, sent on July 30, 2020, proposing a call the next day to discuss picking up on an Epstein-suicide-related FOIA declaration. It indicates ongoing legal or administrative work related to the Jeffrey Epstein case following his death.

persons.name: Associate U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, proposing a call to discuss an Epstein-suicide-related FOIA declaration.

events.title: Proposed call regarding Epstein FOIA
events.description: A call is proposed for 9:30 AM to discuss picking up on an Epstein-suicide-related FOIA declaration.
personsInvolved: Associate U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 30, 2020, from an Associate U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email proposes a call for the following day (July 31, 2020) at 9:30 AM.

The subject of the proposed call is to 'pick up on an Epstein-suicide-related FOIA declaration', indicating ongoing legal or administrative proceedings related to Jeffrey Epstein's death and Freedom of Information Act requests.
